venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Trivia is held on Thursdays at Chuck's Steakhouse at the corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street in Auburn. Teams are comprised of mostly six people. An emcee reads the questions, and the team then submits an answer, bidding a certain number of points each time. The team with the most points is the winner!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a sign, and closer to the event, I will give out my cell phone numbers
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's in Auburn
